programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: When the zombie team spots a small, rundown bungalow in a highly sought-after neighborhood, they have visions of a steal of a deal that could earn a big paycheck; hidden problems like wood rot and termite infestation start demolishing their budget.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: Years of cigarette smoke stain a home's walls and leave a putrid smell throughout the property; as the flippers make over the monster, things start smelling sweeter when they uncover clues to a hidden treasure.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: The team senses a golden opportunity when they check out a zombie house and discover a hidden treasure in the backyard, a buried pool; if it can be restored, it could boost their sale price forty grand.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: A zombie house from the 90's becomes the team's latest project, but any hopes for a fast flip and a quick profit start to sour when they discover that the entire fa√ßade on the front of the house is filled with wood rot and needs to be replaced.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: Work on a giant zombie house in one of Orlando's historic districts forces the team to follow certain guidelines that could come at a historic cost.

programme.title: New House No Debt
programme.desc: Carla and Troy are looking to move their Agro-Tourism business; staying in Kentucky is an option, but Carla's past is calling her home to Southern Michigan.

programme.title: New House No Debt
programme.desc: Gary and Damian want to move from frigid New Jersey to Florida, but their budget is limited; each is drawn to a different city.

programme.title: New House No Debt
programme.desc: Recent retirees Terry and Wendy weigh staying close to their grandkids in Maryland against leaving for a new, carefree life in a golf community in Florida. Terry is eager to move south, but it's an agonizing choice for Wendy..

programme.title: New House No Debt
programme.desc: Elyus and Jeremy know they want to move to Texas, and they're torn between the sprawling DFW metroplex and cozy Lubbock. But all the excitement turns bittersweet for Jeremy as the reality of leaving Phoenix behind sinks in..

programme.title: New House No Debt
programme.desc: Shawn wants his girlfriend Audra to live with him on a boat so he can live out his childhood dream; Audra's heart is set on an urban lifestyle in Philadelphia; Shawn must choose an option that makes them both happy or risk losing the woman he loves.

programme.title: New House No Debt
programme.desc: Michigan native S.J. is ready for a change and wants to move to the greater Phoenix area. But his strong-willed wife Adria likes her life just the way it is. Can S.J. convince Adria to leave the only life she's ever known in Michigan?.

programme.title: Lakefront Luxury
programme.desc: Catherine and Neil tour three waterfront properties hoping to find a place to build memories.
